newsitem.title: CANADA: TransCanada to buy Enron NGL business.
newsitem.headline: TransCanada to buy Enron NGL business.

text.p: TransCanada PipeLines Ltd said on Thursday it entered into a deal to buy Enron Louisiana Energy Co, a unit of Enron Corp, for US$150 million.
TransCanada said the purchase, expected to close at the end of January, would place it among North America's top three natural gas liquids producers with production of 152,000 barrels a day.
